name: Hamdillo
description:
The hamdillo needs your help getting a balloon where it wants to go.

If the job had been assigned to anyone else he would have taken a long lunch and checked their progress after the weekend, but gosh darn it he admires your gusto. When he looks in those huge, watery, disturbingly pruney eyes of yours, he sees a partner. A real teammate. One half of a one-person-one-hamdillo-duo. As far as he's concerned it's ride or die and so far there's been no scientifically proven evidence that hamdillos are capable of dying. What's up with that?

Endlessly loyal, the hamdillo will follow your commands to the last detail. He'll leap, vault, slam, flop, punt, and bounce this balloon to the ends of the earth to get the job done. Despite his meager size, he's nimble enough to focus his efforts into precise, coordinated strikes that guide his cargo through the narrowest gaps.


It's a big job, and you've got an even bigger pair of tiny boots to fill. Are you up to the task?

Gamepad Recommended.

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick to move

Space/A Button to jump

Shift/X Button to Sprint

Escape to pause and see the leaderboards.

Art by @champipen!

www.instagram.com/champipen
